Pre-Game Insights: England and New Zealand meet again, with the 2019 World Cup final still fresh in everyone's mind
Ben Stokes is a major doubt due to a sore hip, potentially affecting England's lineup
Dawid Malan has become the joint-fastest England batter to 1000 ODI runs and is projected to play at the top of the order
Trent Boult returned to form in the recent series against England, taking 8 wickets in 2 matches
Kane Williamson and Tim Southee are not fully fit for the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is set to be held at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, with potential for large crowds
The pitch offers a blend of red and black strips, adding unpredictability to the match
Both teams have a strong World Cup pedigree with multiple semi-final appearances
